page.title: 17 ANGLICAN VICAR'S DAY,BANKS
page.content: {9a.m}. MY DAY BEGINS WITH PRAYER,BIBLE STUDY AND READING IN PREPARATION FOR SERMONS FOR THE FOLLOWING SUNDAY. {9.30 a.m.} I DEAL WITH CORRESPONDENCE AND SPEND TIME ON THE TELEPHONE - ALL RELATED TO PARISH MATTERS.DURING THE MORNING I MAY HAVE TO LEAVE MY OFFICE TO OFFICIATE AT A FUNERAL SERVICE. {12.30a.m}. LUNCH WITH MY FAMILY. {1.30p.m.} FINISHING MY OFFICE WORK. {2.15p.m}. VISITING THE SICK AND HOUSE BOUND;VISITING PARISHIONERS WHO ARE IN HOSPITAL;SOMETIMES I VISIT GREAVES HALL HOSPITAL WHERE I AM CHAPLAIN. {5.30p.m.} HOME FOR TEA WITH MY FAMILY. I HELP PUT THE CHILDREN TO BED. TIME WITH MY FAMILY IS VERY PRECIOUS TO ME. {8.00p.m.}I ATTEND MEETINGS OR SEE PEOPLE ABOUT THEIR PROBLEMS,OR BAPTISM OR WEDDING ARRANGEMENTS. {10.00p.m.} CLOCK OFF !
